item.title: Best Tesla Insurance 2019
item.description: What is the problem with insuring Teslas, anyway? Many freshly-minted Tesla owners are getting quotes that are way higher than for similarly-valued ICE cars, while others are getting quotes that are lower.

item.title: Which EVs are cheapest to insure in California in 2019?
item.description: Background Many Chevy Bolts, Tesla Model 3s, Nissan Leafs and similar are getting way higher quotes than So which are cheapest to insure? So here are some prices from the field for 2019 - the 10 cheapest electric cars to insure in 2019 in California.

item.title: Why the time is right for EV auto insurance specialists
item.description: Just bought a new electric car and need to get car insurance? Take a look at our top tips to help you find the best deal.
